com.ibm.ecm.api.coresdk.model

Interface IBMECMTeamspace

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<IBMECMBaseObject>, IBMECMBaseObject, IBMECMItem, Serializable

    public interface IBMECMTeamspace
extends IBMECMItem
    Represents a teamspace in IBM Content Navigator.

    A teamspace is a restricted view of a repository that allows administrators to control what end users can view and do. It is tied with a teamspace template, which is a starting base for a teamspace instance.

    This class represents a teamspace instance and a teamspace template.

        boolean usesClasses()
        Returns whether this teamspace supports classes. A value of false indicates that it supports only entry templates.
        Returns:

        IBMECMTeamspaceType getType()
        Returns the type of this teampace.

        The type can be IBMECMTeamspaceType.INSTANCE, which is a teamspace instance, or an IBMECMTeamspaceType.TEMPLATE.

        Returns:
        the type of this teamspace

      • getSearchTemplates

        IBMECMSearchTemplate[] getSearchTemplates()
        Returns an array of search templates associated with this teamspace. Users of this teamspace can view and access search templates from this list.
        Returns:
        an array of IBMECMSearchTemplate instances for this teamspace.

      • retrieveUserPermissions

        void retrieveUserPermissions(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMTeamspaceUserPermissions> onComplete)
        Retrieves the teamspace permissions set in this teamspace.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the teamspace permissions

      • editTeamspaceTemplate

        void editTeamspaceTemplate(IBMECMUser[] members,
                           IBMECMUserRole[] roles,
                           IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMTeamspace>> onComplete)
        Edits the teamspace template associated with this teamspace with new members or roles.
        Parameters:
        members - the array of members to update for this teamspace. Set it to null if the members do not need to be updated.
        roles - the array of roles to update for this teamspace. Set it to null if the roles do not need to be updated.
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the updated IBMECMTeamspace object if the call is successful

      • toJson

        String toJson()
        Return the JSON string of the object.
        Returns:
        a JSON string representing the object.
